content:
I think I'll go with sharing a key takeaway with a visual on Facebook, and creating a visual summary on Instagram. I like the idea of using an image that demonstrates the impact of typography on design for Facebook, and creating a series of images that illustrate the importance of typography in design for Instagram.

Here's a possible Facebook post:

"Typography matters! Did you know that choosing the right font can increase engagement and improve user experience? Check out our latest blog post to learn more about the power of typography in design and how you can improve your design skills! [link to blog post] #typography #designprinciples #graphicdesign"

And here's a possible Instagram post:

"Typography 101 Want to take your design skills to the next level? It starts with typography! Swipe through to learn how typography can make or break your design, and how to choose the right font for your project. Read the full blog post in the link in our bio! #typography #designfund
